title: Skins Story Slam: Voting is now live!
body:
https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/oce/Community/FanFic/SkinsStorySlam2.jpg

_EDIT: Voting has closed and the [winners can be found here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/hHvPA1aF-congratulations-to-the-skins-story-slam-winners)!_

Hail writers (and readers this time 'round)!

The [Skins Story Slam](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/GWZ8anEO-skins-story-slam-fanfiction-contest) finalists are up!  

We had an insane amount of awesome entries to sort through—from a galavanting Gromp ride across Runeterra (on a Tuesday) to a little Yordle playing with his toys, a glitzy red carpet event for legendary champs (+ Draven) to an ancient dragon, bored by an onslaught of underwhelming assailants—phew! 

The judges were really spoilt for choice, and had a hard time narrowing it down to so few. But as much as we wanted to include all of your rich stories (did I mention the one where Ekko and Darius punched on in the school gym? Or the alternate timeline where Garen lived in regret after abandoning Demacia? Or the–okay, okay, I'll stop) the final 10 have been chosen and can be found below. 

Thanks to all who entered, and for those who didn't get picked as a finalist—don't be disheartened! This is totally subjective! While we tried to have as much variety as possible (and we would have loved to fit in more) the fact that your entry isn't in here doesn't speak to the quality of the piece so please, keep writing! 

Without further ado, it's up to you to decide which story is your favourite. You can only choose one, so get busy readin' the stories linked below and then get busy votin'!

***

**STORY SLAM FINALISTS: **

[Shadow and Fire](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/N8PzgE3Z-sss-finalist-shadow-and-fire) by zookie
[Four](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/bKhuFwAX-sss-finalist-four) by Jason
[Dragon Slayer](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/lP7KfRV3-sss-finalist-dragon-slayer) by Metablue
[The Moon Rises](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/Xvu6yEw7-sss-finalist-the-moon-rises) by Bahnshii
[Stronger Than Steel](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/2dfGEjQp-sss-finalist-stronger-than-steel) by MeloDD
[Squee-pop! (Previously: Untitled)](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/uYUNs4EE-sss-finalist-squee-pop) by meenoomeenoo
[Noble Ionia (Previously: Untitled)](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/AwfKc5jt-sss-finalist-noble-ionia) by Caedite Eos
[TRACE 1: REBIRTH](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/2a4xi8a8-sss-finalist-trace-1-rebirth) by DreamlessDays
[The Baker and the King](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/ex3NRlwE-sss-finalist-the-baker-and-the-king) by Buttercup
[The Dreadstar](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/8mTzb4NJ-sss-finalist-the-dreadstar) by Saben

***

**HOW TO VOTE:**

1. Read all the stories linked in the list above
2. Decide which story you like the best
3. Be really sure that you like said story the best
4. Vote for ONE STORY ONLY in the poll below (FYI: you will need to be signed in to vote)
5. ~~Instantly regret your vote and try to vote again because they're all so excellent and-~~ Feel incredibly satisfied with your vote and your life choices. You are a great person, and you should let yourself know this more often. 

_Voting closes April 26, 23:59 AEST._

Choose wisely and write on!

-The Hanshmear

replies.body: They are all so great! Congrats to everyone who got on the shortlist ~
Absolutely, congrats to everyone! These were some awesome stories to read, I'm honestly surprised I made it on the same list as y'all. XD
Thanks! I couldn't agree more, I really enjoyed reading everyones entry.
U two wrote the best stories i think! I ended up voting for zookie but I loved the dragon slayer one as well!
You're too kind! I have to agree that Zookie's story is very well written, it deserves all the votes it gets :D
Ah thanks so much <3 Your story was so awesome Metablue. Loved the snapshot into the dragon slayer universe
I am pretty pleased to make the short list. Thanks guys, and best of luck to everyone involved!
Amazed to be shortlisted! This was some good news at an otherwise bad time, as well :) Thank you so much Riot.
Best of wishes to you, and congrats ^~^
Final numbers are in, congrats to the winners!
Its really hard to pick just one!
there was a lot of good story there well done
I agree these are all amazing. Good luck to all of you who reached the top ten. Sucks that i didn't make it but oh well, better luck next time i guess. :)
I loved them all but 'squee-pop!' stood out to me, it was so cute :D <3 good luck to everybody!
{{champion:78}} {{item:3187}} {{summoner:11}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}  thanks the best stories was all of the where all of them it was hard to pick

I'm just grateful my Draven and Red Carpet story got mentioned. TY guys ^^
